DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate educational effectiveness youth-friendly pre-test video ( derive previous qualitative study ) compare in-person HIV pre-test counseling . A convenience sample 200 medically stable individual age 15 21 present urban ED recruit participate study randomize 2 group . Individuals eligible English-speaking , sexually active able consent . All participant complete sexual risk factor demographic survey . Group 1 complete validated pre-test knowledge measure , view HIV education video complete post-test knowledge measure . Group 2 complete knowledge measure , receive pre-test HIV counseling train public health advocate . HIV test optional
DOC.brief_title: Video-based Counseling & Rapid HIV Testing Teens
DOC.criteria: 1521 year old sexually active EnglishSpeaking medically unstable
